name: Surge
description: Surge is a short VR music video made by Arjan van Meerten and produced at House of Secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: intel i3 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: geoforce 560GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: intel i7 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: geforce 970 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Quite good really. Nice little expirence & free.   Would be great to see something like this that had a VR visulisation of tracks you play from your own list. Difference scenes etc.  All in all great for what is a very young VR industry.
Very good short experience. Thank you for sharing that awesome experience.
Short and sweet, surprise ending! Thanks developers.
Short but good. Thank you for making.
I hope one day this is how all music videos are made.
Very cool! I hope more like this are made!

Played it over Oculus.. Anyway, my first VR experience for a music video and it was AWESOME..  Warning Note : Just as the sun is setting before the giants appear, the bright boxes were just too flashy bright and may cause problems with sensitive people.. Maybe some warning should be implemented...  But it was AWESOME!
Wow! A very cool VR music video experience. Almost felt a bit like I was in Lawnmower Man. Very very cool indeed.
Outstanding artistic expression. There will be a day when we look back on this say, 'This broke new ground'.

Great Experience, i thoroughly enjoyed the final part. The first time i saw it my jaw dropped becouse the scale was just amazing. I just wished i had packd my maneuver gear, to play some with those titans ;)
Quite immersive and beautiful to behold. One of the best VR experiences available on Steam.
